channel.title: Posts on Erwin Kuhn
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Erwin Kuhn

item.title: There's no plan B for concrete
item.description: This is the first post in a series about the cement & concrete industries and their place in the climate fight. It provides a general introduction to the subject, with some surprising facts I discovered along the way. This is a personal perspective and is subject to change based on feedback and further discussions. Feel free to reach out! I’ve been working for the past few months with Vicat.sidenote__button::after{ content: '\002a' } .
